offenceResults.applicationTitle: Appeal against conviction by a Magistrates' Court to the Crown Court
offenceResults.impositionOffenceDetails:
FCOST - Costs
To pay costs of £10.00 to Aldi Stores
FO - Fine
Fined £1111.09
FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £100.00
SV - Sentence varied
Appeal heard on: 11/07/2024
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 11/09/2025.
